item.title: Mophie Launches New Qi2 Wireless Chargers
item.description: Mophie today announced the launch of four new Qi2 wireless chargers that can charge MagSafe-compatible iPhones at up to 15W. The $60 Powerstation Wireless Slim has an ultra-thin design that’s mean

item.title: Mophie Launches Max Charging Stand for Charging Multiple AirPods
